trans-unit.resname: G06·1 | Exalted Angel | Card Text | Paragraph 1
G06·1 | Exalted Angel | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME deals damage, you gain that much life.
trans-unit.target: Whenever CARDNAME deals damage, you gain that much life.

trans-unit.resname: G06·1 | Exalted Angel | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: Morph {2}{W}{W} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
trans-unit.target: Morph {2}{W}{W} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)

trans-unit.source: "She is a theme of honor and renown, ...Whose present courage may beat down our foes."\n—William Shakespeare, *Troilus and Cressida*
trans-unit.target: "She is a theme of honor and renown, ...Whose present courage may beat down our foes."\n—William Shakespeare, *Troilus and Cressida*

trans-unit.resname: G06·2 | Grim Lavamancer | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {R}, {T}, Exile two cards from your graveyard: CARDNAME deals 2 damage to any target.
trans-unit.target: {R}, {T}, Exile two cards from your graveyard: CARDNAME deals 2 damage to any target.

trans-unit.source: "Fools dig for water, corpses, or gold. The earth's real treasure is far deeper."
trans-unit.target: "Fools dig for water, corpses, or gold. The earth's real treasure is far deeper."

trans-unit.resname: G06·3 | Meddling Mage | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: As CARDNAME enters the battlefield, choose a nonland card name.
trans-unit.target: As CARDNAME enters the battlefield, choose a nonland card name.

trans-unit.resname: G06·3 | Meddling Mage | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Spells with the chosen name can't be cast.
trans-unit.target: Spells with the chosen name can't be cast.

trans-unit.source: Meddling mages chant so loudly that no one can get a spell in edgewise.
trans-unit.target: Meddling mages chant so loudly that no one can get a spell in edgewise.

trans-unit.resname: G06·4 | Pernicious Deed | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {X}, Sacrifice CARDNAME: Destroy each artifact, creature, and enchantment with mana value X or less.
trans-unit.target: {X}, Sacrifice CARDNAME: Destroy each artifact, creature, and enchantment with mana value X or less.

trans-unit.source: "The tyrannous and bloody deed is done, The most arch deed of piteous massacre That ever yet this land was guilty of."\n—William Shakespeare, *Richard III*
trans-unit.target: "The tyrannous and bloody deed is done, The most arch deed of piteous massacre That ever yet this land was guilty of."\n—William Shakespeare, *Richard III*
